name: Chicken Salad with Bacon, Lettuce, and Tomato
author: Angel
summary: This chicken salad has a creamy dressing and is best served over crisp lettuce leaves.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels; crumble
Stir chicken, bacon, tomato, and celery together in a bowl
Whisk mayonnaise, parsley, green onions, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl until dressing is smooth
Pour dressing over chicken mixture; toss to coat
Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes
Stir chicken mixture and serve over romaine lettuce leaves; garnish with avocado slices
